item.title: Hill Charts in R
item.description: What is a Hill Chart anyway? https://basecamp.com/features/hill-charts Building the tool (basic concepts) #reference https://github.com/rstudio/DT/pull/480

item.title: Research data management: how to get to 'good enough'
item.description: Why this post? Here I discuss a few key points, suggest external resources, and share personal experiences for those that have recognized the importance of changing their habits of research data management, but have not taken their first step in this journey. This post is fully inspired by the nice (open access!) work of Wilson et al. (2017), in which a set of good enough practices in scientific computing is laid down.
